articles.author: Samuel Bannister
articles.title: Champions League draw: Man City meet Messi; Man Utd get chance for revenge - Teamtalk.com
articles.description: Chelsea's defence of Europe's top trophy will include games against Juventus, while Manchester City will be facing Lionel Messi's PSG after the Champions League draw for the group stage was made.
articles.content:
Chelsea’s defence of Europe’s top trophy will include games against Juventus, while Manchester City will be facing Lionel Messi’s PSG after the Champions League draw for the group stage was made.
